cache_responses.who is faruk?: Faruk Hasan is a Senior QA Engineer and educator with over 5 years of experience in automation testing, CI/CD, and cloud infrastructure. He specializes in Playwright, Python, and AI-driven testing.
cache_responses.what is faruk's email?: You can contact Faruk at faruqmul@gmail.com.
cache_responses.contact info: You can reach Faruk via email at faruqmul@gmail.com or through his LinkedIn profile.
cache_responses.tell me about his tutoring: Faruk offers coding and AI tutoring for middle and high school students, focusing on Python, game development, and AI concepts. He teaches on platforms like Outschool.
cache_responses.what is playwright?: Playwright is a modern automation framework by Microsoft for end-to-end testing. Faruk specializes in using it with Python for reliable and fast web testing.
cache_responses.does he have a youtube channel?: Yes, Faruk has a YouTube channel called 'Kidz Code' where he shares coding tutorials and educational content.
cache_responses.what is his github?: You can find Faruk's open-source projects on GitHub at https://github.com/faruklmu17.

My Python courses range from **absolute beginner** to **advanced**. We build real projects like chatbots, games, and data tools.

cache_responses.how can i contact faruk?: You can reach me via email at **faruqmul@gmail.com** for inquiries about tutoring, QA consulting, or collaboration. I do not use other private email addresses for business.

cache_responses.what is your career journey?:
My path was unique! After my Masters in LA, I worked various jobs including teaching charter school math and driving for Uber. 

In 2020, I broke into tech as a **QA Engineer** and quickly grew to a **Senior SDET**. I now combine my tech expertise with my passion for teaching.
